name: Star Surfer
description:
Controller Needed (XBox Controller is the reference for inputs)

- A to Jump

- X to Fire Weapon

- Left/Right D-Pad to Move

- Down on D-Pad to Crouch (does nothing meaningful)

Tips:

- Hold the Jump Button to go a little higher!
- The Green Moving platforms can be shot to be activated.

Credits

- Developer and Pixel Artist - RamZ

- Music/SFX - PGMMV RTP

- Sound Design - Abstract the Origin
